features: Studless TV Wall Mount: Tired of the hassle of drilling big holes or finding studs in your wall? This Perlegear no stud TV wall mount does not require any drilling or installation experience at all. Simply use a hammer to secure the wall plate onto drywall with nails.

Strong & Reliable: Made of thick, heavy-duty steel with a wall plate that is 2x wider for strength, the sturdy fixed TV mount can easily hold up to 100 lbs. Anti-drop wall plate edges and pull cord security locks ensure reliable stability to keep your TV in place.

Wide Compatibility: The no drill TV wall mount fits most 24″–55″ TVs with VESA patterns 100x100 to 400x400mm. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase. In addition to drywall, this TV mount includes hardware for installation on 8"/12"/16" wood studs, concrete, brick, and block walls. The innovative design provides greater flexibility when choosing where to place your TV. Mount your TV practically anywhere in your home or office.

Create a Streamlined Look: The low-profile TV wall mount sits only 1.12″ away from the wall for a sleek and modern look that saves space. Elevate the appearance of your room with a wall mount TV bracket that is minimal and complements any living area.

Quicky & Easy Installation: Hanging your TV is now just as easy as hanging a picture frame with the included instructions, bubble level, and drilling template. Securing and releasing the TV from the no drill TV wall mount is simple thanks to the pull cord locking mechanism on each bracket.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perlegear TV Wall Mount for 24″ - 55″ TVs | Mount Your TV With Minimal Hassle The PGMT7 studless TV wall mount 55 inch offers a reliable and durable way to mount your TV on practically any wall. In addition to the flexible mounting options, the integrated pull cord locking mechanism makes it easy to lock or release your TV from the wall plate for security and convenience.

55 Inch TV Wall Mount with Flexible Mounting Options This innovative 55 inch TV wall mount from Perlegear can be installed directly on drywall with the included nails. Mounting hardware is also included for installation on 8”/12”/16” wood studs, concrete, brick, or block walls for maximum security. Why Choose Perlegear Studless TV Wall Mount?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for a 32 inch diagonal screen
reviews.reviewText: I used this to hang a Samsung QED 32 inch flat screen TV on my bedroom wall at the foot of my bed. The other bracket I purchased at BEST BUY had braces that were too long and showed from the bottom. This bracket mounted very easily and is very sturdy and is compact and flat enough that the TV appears to be flush to the wall. Very easy to take the TV on and off if needed but sturdy enough to keep it in place without any worry. Highly recommend. The similar item I purchased at BEST BUY was over $100, and it didn't even work for the TV they sold to go with it since the brackets showed from the bottom. I found this on Amazon, it was a FRACTION of the price, and it works 100% better than the one that cost 5X this cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job well!
reviews.reviewText: These things are great. I ordered 2 of them to hang TVs in bedrooms. One 50inch and one 32inch. They are solid and so much easier to use than the mounts I've had in the past. To top it off, they are about half the price!The quick disconnect tabs also make taking the TV down much easier than reaching your hand under and unscrewing the lock screws. I had to reposition mine after the initial mount to add a bit more tilt and it was a breeze.The included hardware has everything you need to mount just the way you like it.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy - but slight squeak to it.
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install, especially when you use the drywall method. just a number of the provided nails put in very the specified holes on the install board.Holds about 100 lbs, feels sturdy and good. It is an anchor method wall mount, so the weight is on two hook like sections on the back of your screen. If you need to move the screen to the left or right, which is easy to do, you will hear a metal on metal squeak.I don't care, I don't need to move the screen, but you might need to very often, if so, maybe get a different wall mount or somehow cover the metal anchoring section in some kind of plastic or whatever.Overall, it's wonderful. Go for it, so cheap yet good, can't go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very strong tv mount that's close to the wall and easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this TV mount and will use it to hang any future TVs I want to mount to a wall. It works like a French cleat, with one part attaching to existing mounting holes in the back of your tv and one part attached to the wall. It doesn't require finding studs to mount it so it can be hung anywhere giving you full control of where you place your TV. While it doesn't rotate left or right, it does bring the TV nice and close to the wall - not sticking out 4 or 5 inches like some TV mounts do. I don't like seeing the back of the tv when walking by, and this solves that problem. It is very strong and sturdy - the TV is not coming down until you take it down. Pro tip - use a level or measure to ensure you're placing the part that attaches to the wall perfectly straight so your TV won't hang crooked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was it really easy?? Yes
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are simple, , gave you mounting options, had different pegs for tilting so your not breaking your neck looking up to a fixed angle, easy take off and put back in case your married and she makes you change it 3 times and still chooses her first choice lol, it's all over great, getting another one for spare room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY TO INSTALL, QUICK AND STURDY
reviews.reviewText: This is a fairly simple device which did not take long at all. I think most people could install on their own. It is best to find a solid area such as upright wooden struts within the wall. Using the plugs just on drywall is not a good idea and unlikely to hold your television.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Works Like Magic
reviews.reviewText: I had an odd location that I needed to mount my 50" television. and did not have studs that I could use. Because of the size of the television, I did not want to use heavy duty anchors. So, I came across this mount.I must admit, I was skeptical at first. I did not believe it would work and that I would find my television on the floor, in pieces, when I got home. The directions were not the easiest to follow though. But I was able to figure it out. It takes two people to install. and that is not because of weight, but to get it nice and level. The mount comes with a small level, but I can not vouch for its accuracy. For that reason, I recommend using your own level, if you have one. It took my wife and I about 5 minutes to install. It was very easy. Putting the television on the mount was a breeze and I was able to take it off and put it back on. It is early, but it seems very solid. Where has this mount been all my life. I am very glad that I purchased this product and highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and heavy duty, not flimsy
reviews.reviewText: This was a great way to mount our 32” tv. It was easy to install using the nail method and going studless. Studs are usuall not where you need them so this was a great alternate. No way the tv will be in danger of fall or sliding off. We are very satisfied!
